name: The Finite Hallway
description:
Theme:

Infinite Hallway - Weekly Game Jam Week 87

Description:

You find yourself trapped in a seemingly endless hallway. The only other object in the room is a screen. How will you escape from this nightmare? Hotel? Trivago.

Content warning:

Game contains flashing images and horror elements.

Controls: 

WASD to move

Space to jump (Hold space to b-hop)

E to interact

ESC to unlock cursor in game.

Credits:

Tan Jun Rong

Jarrett Ang https://jarrett-ang.itch.io/
